comments.body:

Thanks for discovering and fixing this issue.

description:
DToA.java is a translation of a .c file by David M. Gay. Somewhere along the
way, his copyright got removed. It needs to be replaced.

As far as I can see, we can keep the tri-license in there, because his license
permits us to license our changes however we like.

Gerv
